mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.pro_code, p.pro_name, pro_order FROM bom b JOIN process p ON(b.pro_code = p.pro_code) WHERE item_code = #{iCode} ORDER BY 3

SELECT item_con, pro_name, item_name, mr_lot_number FROM bom b JOIN itemlist i ON(b.ing_code = i.item_code) JOIN process p ON(b.pro_code = p.pro_code) JOIN material m ON(b.ing_code = m.item_code) WHERE b.item_code = #{itemCode} and b.pro_code = #{proCode} ORDER BY pro_order
